column4: Hey.  I've got a problem with multiple applications connecting to the internet...
Firefox, Foxmarks, Secondlife, Midori, Seamonkey, Pidgin.

Yes, sometimes it works, and sometimes it doesn't.  I disabled IPv6 in Firefox, and it got better, but it's still not perfect.  For example, AJAX stuff isn't working in Firefox 3.0.1, but I think that has something to do with the way Mozilla changed the way it handles AJAX now.
